```{r}

library(readr)
library(dplyr)

ipums_data <- read_fwf(
  file = "data/data_raw/gendergrad.dat.gz",
  col_positions = fwf_cols(
    year     = c(1, 4),
    serial   = c(5, 12),
    pernum   = c(13, 16),
    perwt    = c(17, 26),
    sex      = c(27, 27),
    educ     = c(28, 29),
    educd    = c(30, 32),
    empstat  = c(33, 33),
    empstatd = c(34, 35)
  ),
  col_types = "iiiddiiii"
)


```

This quarto doc is used to organize the data.
